metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7410 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The _dwarf_read_loc_section function in dwarf_loc.c in libdwarf 20160613 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7410` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20160923-1
libdwarf1 - 20160923-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160923-1').
